faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: We answer frequently asked questions from our customers

items.question: Can NFC be used on any smartphone?
items.answer:
Compatible with 95% of smartphones. Available on iPhone 7 and later, and Android NFC-compatible models.
For specific compatible models, please check the official website of each smartphone manufacturer.

items.question: What is the accuracy of business card reading?
items.answer:
AI business card scanning and VCard conversion accuracy is 95%. We aim for further accuracy improvement through continuous improvement.
If recognition fails, manual correction is also possible.

items.question: Can I change the link site design myself?
items.answer:
Unlimited design changes are possible from the management screen.
Text and contact information can be easily updated.

items.question: Please tell me how to use multilingual support
items.answer:
Currently supports 2 languages (Japanese & English) that you can switch between. Chinese, Korean, and Spanish will be added for 5-language support.
You can select the display language on the profile screen, so you can use it in your preferred language regardless of the other party's smartphone language settings.

items.question: Can it be used offline?
items.answer:
Currently, we recommend using it in an online environment.
Offline functionality is under consideration for the future. We prioritize stable service provision in an online environment, taking advantage of the no-app benefit.

items.question: What is the subscription pricing plan?
items.answer: It's a 3-month renewal system: ¬•700 for months 1-3, ¬•600 for months 4-6, and ¬•500 from month 6 onwards. The longer you continue, the more affordable the plan becomes.

items.question: Is it possible to order with a one-time purchase?
items.answer: Yes, it is possible. You can discuss pricing starting from ¬•3,000 per account. For details, please contact us through the contact form.

items.question: Can anyone apply for beta testing?
items.answer: Beta testing is only available for customers in Japan. If you wish to order from overseas, please contact us individually through the contact form.

items.question: What should I do if I want to change the design of my business card?
items.answer: You can order additional cards (starting from ¬•500/card). Please consult us through the contact form.
